original_text: Watch over the group of believers that God has given to you. Be like a shepherd that takes care of his sheep. Lead them well because you want to do it. Do not do it just because you have to do it. Do it in the way that God wants for you. Do not be a leader because you want to receive money for yourself. Instead, do it because you want to help people. Peter Introduction
korean_text: 너희 중에 있는 하나님의 양 무리를 치되 억지로 하지 말고 하나님의 뜻을 따라 자원함으로 하며 더러운 이득을 위하여 하지 말고 기꺼이 하며

sentences.original_text: Watch over the group of believers
that God has given to you
that takes care of his sheep
because you want to do it

Do it in the way that God wants for you
Do not be a leader because you want to receive money
sentences.korean_translation: 돈을 받고 싶어서 지도자가 되지 말라
